screen.energymod.title: Wire Configuration
book.energymod.wiki.title: Energy Mod Wiki
book.energymod.wiki.author: EnergyMod
book.energymod.wiki.page1: Energy cells hold Forge Energy and act as buffers. Connect wires to move power between machines. Use the Wire Tool to toggle each side.
book.energymod.wiki.page2: Craft wires from three copper ingots and one lead ingot in a row to receive four wires. Right-click a wire with the tool to cycle TAKE or GIVE.
book.energymod.wiki.page3: There are four cell tiers: ML stores 100k FE, SR stores 1M, MX stores 10M and the infinite cell never runs dry.
book.energymod.wiki.page4: Solar panels generate FE only in daylight with clear skies. Use energy cells to buffer power through the night or rain.
book.energymod.wiki.page5: Thermal generators shut down in icy biomes or when touching water or snow. Contact with magma, fire or lava grants 80% efficiency.
book.energymod.wiki.page6: Wind turbines work best when placed high up. Their blades spin faster during storms and provide additional FE.
book.energymod.wiki.page7: The Metal Filler consumes 800 FE over five seconds to turn iron and coal into cast iron ingots. The process pauses without power.
book.energymod.wiki.page8: Copper, lead and osmium ores spawn deep underground from Y30 to bedrock. Smelt them into ingots for crafting machines and wires.
book.energymod.wiki.page9: Wire modes include AUTO, TAKE, GIVE and DISABLED. AUTO balances energy with neighbors. Sneak-click with the tool to open settings.
book.energymod.wiki.page10: All generators now produce half their previous power. Use /wiki for help and check the Energy Generator creative tab for every block.
